channel.title: Project: MojoScape Dev. Team!
channel.description:
As you know Newb 2341 has a thread on his dev. and he is most likely going to make some perfect awesome server but I'm making a more simple one. Well i am going to try to get a team together to make one of the better servers here on mopar. Here are some spots we are looking for:
[b]Project Managers[/b]
[ul][li]Mod Robby[/li] [li]Xbox Modder[/li] [li]open[/li][/ul]
[b]Server Coders:[/b]
[ul][li]Mod Robby[/li] [li]† Nirvana †[/li] [li]Xbox Modder[/li][/ul]
[b]Client Coders:[/b]
[ul][li]carney[/li] [li]Xbox Modder[/li] [li]Open[/li][/ul]
[b]No-Ip Host:[/b]
[ul][li]carney[/li][/ul]
[b]Server Advertisers:[/b]
[ul][li]Open[/li] [li]Open[/li] [li]Open[/li][/ul]
[b]Rules:[/b] You will need to learn how to adapt to working with others to create a server. If you cannot figure out how to get along you will be kicked out of the project.
*Need to be member or higher- Any lower then that can only be a no-ip host.
*Host needs to be able to keep server on 24/7
*You must have coded a server in the past to be a project manager, server coder, or a client coder.
[b]Format:[/b] Name: Position applying for: Why you would fit this: Are you good at working with others? y/n What servers have you coded: Any other useful information:
[b][u]!~!~Forum~!~![/u][/b]
[url=http://projectmojo.smfforfree3.com/index.php]Project Mojo[/url]
[b][u]!~!~Server Source~!~![/b][/i] Ultimate PK
thanks, Mod Robby

item.title: Project: MojoScape Dev. Team!
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

[quote=“carney, post:8, topic:92118”][quote author=mod robby link=topic=134037.msg1293606#msg1293606 date=1178800667]

Name: Carney
Position applying for: Client Coder
Why you would fit this: Because Im good at making clients
Are you good at working with others? Yes
What servers/clients have you coded: 4 servers of my own and 2 clients
Any other useful information: Im Sexy like  Nirvana 

i can host a no-ip aswell as a a ham
[/quote]Can u post a no-ip 24.7?

corse :D[/quote]

exellent when the server is fully made you will be hosting it ;D[br][size=1]Posted on: May 10, 2007, 08:10:25 AM[/size][hr]oh yeah and thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Project: MojoScape Dev. Team!
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

[quote=“Xbox Modder, post:6, topic:92118”]Name: Mike Meehan? Or forum name is Xbox Modder
Position applying for: Server / Client Coder
Why you would fit this: I have coded both servers and client, and I don’t believe this is too different… Also, once I am done with my lunar magics, maybe you could try them on your server :S
Are you good at working with others? Yes
What servers have you coded: MikeScape… Not the current one but my own version which I hosted a while ago… Got to 74 players with like 2 nulls…
Any other useful information: Nothing really…[/quote]
Okay I will put you in server coding and client coder, and i was corious if you could host server 24/7 on a no-ip.
Also i want to promote you to Manager ;D cause i have seen your expiriance.

Read full topic

item.title: Project: MojoScape Dev. Team!
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

Name: Mike Meehan? Or forum name is Xbox Modder
Position applying for: Server / Client Coder
Why you would fit this: I have coded both servers and client, and I don’t believe this is too different… Also, once I am done with my lunar magics, maybe you could try them on your server :S
Are you good at working with others? Yes
What servers have you coded: MikeScape… Not the current one but my own version which I hosted a while ago… Got to 74 players with like 2 nulls…
Any other useful information: Nothing really…
